name: Pocketman Third D
description:
"Feel the ultimate power... of the Pocketman Experience in THIRD D!" 
- Description from the back of the CD case

Pocketman Third D is a roleplaying "monster tamer" game from 1998. Originally released on the ill fated Powerbox 620, a fifth-generational console that only was sold for seven hours before being pulled from shelves for dangerous levels of radiation, it has been painstakingly ported to Unity by Bynine Studio so it can be experienced by a wide audience. Please enjoy!
